channel.title: Robert Myers, Psychotherapist : depth psychotherapy for individuals, couples, and families : Portland, Maine
channel.description: Robert Myers, Psychotherapist : depth psychotherapy for individuals, couples, and families : Portland, Maine

item.title: I am a psychotherapist trained in the Depth tradition of Carl Jung, James Hillman, and Joseph Campbell.
item.description:
I am a psychotherapist trained in the Depth tradition of Carl Jung, James Hillman, and Joseph Campbell.

"As a psychotherapist I have assisted individuals, couples, and families to become healthier in their relationships, to address their addiction challenges, and to make meaning of traumatic personal suffering.
